amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore the requirement for a 2/3 majority vote in order for the Financial Stability Oversight Council to overrule a Consumer Financial Protection Bureau regulation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-172 to restore a 2/3 majority vote in order for the Financial Stability Oversight Council to overrule Consumer Financial Protection Bureau regulation.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 239 (Roll no. 615).
